channel.title: Celine Song on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Materialists’ Director Celine Song Says It’s “Very Cruel” to Call Film “Broke Man Propaganda”
item.description: “It makes me feel very concerned that anybody would talk about my movie and my characters and to really think about it in such classist terms,” the filmmaker says.

item.title: ‘Materialists’ Director Celine Song Says It’s “Very Cruel” to Call Film “Broke Man Propaganda”
item.description: “It makes me feel very concerned that anybody would talk about my movie and my characters and to really think about it in such classist terms,” the filmmaker says.

item.title: ‘My Best Friend’s Wedding’ Sequel in the Works With ‘The Materialists’ Filmmaker Celine Song
item.description: Song is attached to write the project, which would not necessarily be her next movie.

item.title: Where to Watch ‘Materialists’ Online
item.description: Writer-director Celine Song’s new film stars Dakota Johnson, Chris Evans, Pedro Pascal and others — here’s when the romantic comedy is expected to land on HBO Max.
